projectConfig.title: Open Source Projects
projectConfig.description: Projects that I created or maintaining

list.0: "Stars" and "Forks" are data from each GitHub repository queried from api.github.com.
list.1: "Downloads" refers to the number of downloads of each npm package queried from api.npmjs.org, including: users installing from the command line, being downloaded as a dependency of other packages, downloading from CI/CD servers, and downloading from mirrors. <more>Click here to learn more</more>.
list.2: The data overview only counts the total data of unique repositories and unique packages (multiple projects in the same Monorepo are not counted repeatedly), and card data is presented by the repositories and packages to which they belong.
list.3: The data is updated once a day, and only historical data is recorded incrementally.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: This is a picture I took when I was giving Luna a bath in 2017. It was the first time she had a bath in her cat life. Her curious and frightened expression was just like you who have come to the 404 page now.
notFound.feedback: If your previously favorite link has been removed，Please create an <issue></issue> so I can fix it.
